meta.content: Corrections; Books; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of June 13 Science Times article on book, 'Nuestros, Cuerpos, Nuestras Vidas,' Latina version of women's health book, 'Our Bodies, Ourselves'

block.p: An article in Science Times on June 13 about the book ''Nuestros Cuerpos, Nuestras Vidas,'' a Latina version of the women's health book ''Our Bodies, Ourselves'' imprecisely characterized comments by Dr. Jane L. Delgado, president and chief executive of the National Alliance for Hispanic Health, a nonprofit network of Hispanic health providers. Dr. Delgado said that in saying that a book's acceptance should be helped by paying respect to the cultural cornerstones of faith and family, she was referring to her own book, ''Sa-lud!''a guide to health for Hispanic women, not to ''Nuestros Cuerpos, Nuestras Vidas.''

An article in Science Times on June 13 about the book ''Nuestros Cuerpos, Nuestras Vidas,'' a Latina version of the women's health book ''Our Bodies, Ourselves'' imprecisely characterized comments by Dr. Jane L. Delgado, president and chief executive of the National Alliance for Hispanic Health, a nonprofit network of Hispanic health providers. Dr. Delgado said that in saying that a book's acceptance should be helped by paying respect to the cultural cornerstones of faith and family, she was referring to her own book, ''Sa-lud!''a guide to health for Hispanic women, not to ''Nuestros Cuerpos, Nuestras Vidas.''
